Other Information.Additional Info: Enhanced solubility and diffusivity for ethylene compared to ethane.
Excluded due to size being larger than the pore cross-sectional area of UTSA-280.

Experimental Validation.Method: Pure gas permeability test, Mixed gas separation test
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C2H4 permeability: 6.49 Barrer, C2H4/C2H6 selectivity: 4.94 (at optimal loading of 21.80 wt%)

Other Information.Additional Info: The incorporation of UTSA-280 into 6FDA-DAM:DABA(3:2) MMMs enhanced both C2H4 permeability and C2H4/C2H6 selectivity, demonstrating the importance of permeability matching between filler and matrix.
